With the profits, Ernest hopes to save his money until he can afford to buy another machine for his business.

loans.use: to buy another flour mill.

loans.name: Hoziana

texts.en: Hoziana is 31 years old, has 3 childre, who are ages 1-6 years old, and only the eldest is enrolled in school yet. Hoziana sells metal pieces which are used for the manufacture of metal doors. Hoziana works with her husband in this business. They also sell a local drink called ubushera, which is made from malted sorghum. They have had this business for 10 years, and it has enabled them to build their own house in which they live, and a second house, which they rent out. Hoziana is requesting this loan to buy additional metal, and with the profits she plans to save them and increase her capital.

loans.use: to buy additional metal to resell

loans.name: Danyoon

texts.es: Danyoon, tiene 26 años. Él vive junto a su mamá Betty, su padre Dany y sus menores hermanos a los que apoya económicamente. En su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Guacamayo (selva central peruana). Desde hace 4 años se dedica a la siembra de cítricos como: naranja y tangelo, producto que acaba de sembrar, en una hectárea de terreno agrícola que heredó de sus padres. Los cuales gracias a su buen cuidado, los comercializa a los comerciantes mayoristas que llegan a su propio cultivo. Ahora según menciona está en plena recolección de frutas ya maduradas, para poder hacer la primera venta. Pero como desde niño le gusto la música, también trabaja desde hace 15 años, tocando piano en diferentes eventos artísticos. Él pertenece al banco comunal “nuevo amanecer de Guacamayo”, y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde es uno de los integrantes más jóvenes de su asociación. Danyoon, cuida constantemente sus cultivos, y aunque no tiene mucho tiempo, está pensando comprar con el crédito que solicita, varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá entre sus cultivos de cítricos.
texts.en:
Danyoon is 26 years old. He lives together with his mother Betty, with his father Dany, and his younger siblings, whom he supports financially. His house is located in the community of Guacamayo (central Peruvian jungle). For the past 4 years he has been growing citrus fruits such as: oranges and tangelos. He has recently done his plantation on a hectare of agricultural land that was inherited to him by his parents.  Due to the great attention he is able to sell his products to the wholesalers that visit his plantation. He is in the full harvest of fruits that are already ripe in order to carry out an initial sale. 

Ever since he was a child he has loved music, so he has been playing piano at various cultural events for the past 15 years.  

He is a member of the communal bank named "Nuevo Amanecer de Guacamayo", meaning "A New Dawn of Guacamayo", and it is the first loan he has with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). He is one of the youngest members of their group. Danyoon constantly attends to his harvest and although he doesn't have very much time, he plans on purchasing various sacks of organic fertilizer to spread throughout his citrus plantation.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizers

loans.name: Gaudance

texts.en: Gaudance is 32 years old, and has 4 children between 3 and 11 years old. Gaudance’s husband is a doctor, and Gaudance is a pharmacist. Gaudance would like a loan to buy additional strong medications to sell. Gaudance has had this business for 6 years, and it has enabled her to buy whatever she needs. With the profits she hopes to realize, Gaudance plans to pay for her children's school fees as well as renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy additional medications to sell

loans.name: Albin

texts.es:
Albín C. Jiménez, tiene la edad de 19 años, está soltero y vive con sus papás. El quiere compra almacigo para la resiembra de su cafetal y también algunos insumos. El cuenta con el terreno y lo que quiere es resembrar las zonas más dañadas para así aumentar la cosecha próxima y crecer como un caficultor de la zona. El pretende con estas mejoras generar mayor producción de café y  así también le genere ganancias para seguir adelante con su proyecto y mejorar su bienestar 
Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Albín C. Jiménez is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents.  He would like to buy seedbeds so that he can re-seed his coffee plantation and also buy some supplies.

Albín owns his own land and what he would like to do is re-seed the most damaged areas so that he can increase his next harvest and improve his position as a local coffee grower.  By making these improvements, Albín plans to produce more coffee and also make profits that will enable him to continue with his project and improve his well-being.

This is the second loan that Albín has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has had no previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered him loans with easier payment terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy seedbeds

loans.name: Duo Princesas Del Mar Group

texts.es:
Grupo Solidario Princesas del mar: Este grupo la conforman Brenda Esmeralda: y Maria Floritcelda tienen diferente negocio pero un mismo objetivo.
Floritcelda tiene su tienda donde vende productos comestibles de primera Necesidad ella alquila un local serca del mercado de su localidad tambien tiene otra venta donde tambien vende productos comestibles de primera necesidad ella solicita el credito para la compra de productos comestibles de primera necesidad. y asi obtener mas ganacias para ayudar a su familia economicamente.
Laseñora Brenda Esmeralda,se dedica a la venta de ropa tipica ella confecciona blusas fajas y cortes tipicos, de la misma manera ella sale a vender en el mercado de su localidad su producto ella solicita este credito para la compra de materia prima para confeccion de tejidos y asi obtener mejores ganacias.
texts.en:
This group's members are Brenda Esmeralda and María Floritcelda.  They have different businesses but share the same goal.

Floritcelda has a store where she sells basic food products.  She hires premises near her town's market.  She also has another sales location where she sells basic food products.  She is requesting this loan so that she can buy basic food products and thereby make more profits to help her family financially.

Brenda Esmeralda's business is selling traditional clothing.  She makes blouses, belts, sashes and other traditional clothes.  She sells her products in the local market.  Brenda is requesting this loan to buy material for making her clothes so that she can make better profits.

loans.use: to buy basic food products and to buy material

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cattle to resell

loans.name: Señor De La Esperanza Group

texts.es: Norma es una de las 7 integrantes de la Alcancía Comunal “Señor de la Esperanza” ubicada en la zona rural  de Matucana y tiene el cargo de presidenta. Norma tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 02 hijos de los cuales uno esta a su cargo y actualmente esta estudiando, gracias a su esfuerzo. Últimamente adquirió un pequeño quiosco que lo ha ubicado en la puerta de su vivienda y vende comida, frituras como: anticuchos, panchos, pollo a la parrilla. Trabaja arduamente pues tiene clientes que trabajan en la carretera realizando mantenimiento. Norma desea invertir el capital obtenido en útiles escolares para la campaña2011, pues sabe que obtendrá ganancias extras para su economía. Además de seguir en la venta de comida. Su sueño es llegar a tener su propia bodega en casa. En la Alcancía Comunal Señor de la esperanza los socios participan activamente y son puntuales en sus pagos, y están agradecidos por las atenciones a su solicitud. Por motivo de horario de trabajo la Sra. Ileodora no llego a tiempo pues trabaja en un hospital san Juan de Matucana como cocinera. La señorita adjunta C. labora como cosmetóloga en la ciudad de Chosica y la distancia hacia Matucana la imposibilito para estar puntual en la reunión de desembolso.
texts.en:
Norma is one of the 7 members of the "Señor de la Esperanza" (Lord of Hope) community bank which is located in the rural area of Matucana.  She is the group's president.

Norma is 53 years old, a single mother, and has two children, one of whom is in her care and currently studying thanks to her hard work.  Norma recently acquired a small kiosk which she has located outside her home and there she sells meals and fried food such as kebabs, hot dogs and grilled chicken.  She works hard because she has customers who carry out maintenance work on the roads.  Norma would like to invest her loan money in obtaining school supplies for the 2011 school year since she knows that this way she will make extra profits.  She will also continue selling meals.

Norma's dream is to one day have a grocery store in her home.  The members of the "Señor de la Esperanza" community bank are active participants and they are punctual in making their repayments.  They are grateful for the attention people pay to their request.

Owing to her working hours, Ileodora did not arrive in time for this photo.  She works in San Juan de Matucana Hospital as a cook.  The lady whose photo is added to the main photo is Miss C..  She works as a cosmetologist in the city of Chosica and the distance between Chosica and Matucana made it impossible for her to be punctual in arriving at the loan disbursement meeting.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for the upcoming school year

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Don Simón, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 11 y 14 años de edad,  tiene 68 años de edad, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 40 años, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre, trabaja todos los días de la semana cuando esta la temporada del cultivo.
Él solicita un préstamo para el pago de alquiler de terreno donde sembrara maíz, don Simón no tiene un terreno amplio para utilizar para el trabajo, por eso recurre a un préstamo para tener la cantidad de dinero que los dueños de terrenos  les piden para que lo puedan utilizar en la siembra de maíz y frijol.
Este préstamo será de mucha ayuda para don Simón, ya que comenzara a preparar el terreno para sembrar y en unos meses llegara su beneficio con la cosecha; Su objetivo es trabajar cada temporada para apoyar a su familia y a sus hijos para que terminen sus estudios.
texts.en: Simón lives in El Tránsito in the Department of San Miguel with his wife and two children who are 11 and 14 years old.  He is 68 years old and has worked growing corn and beans for 40 years, a trade which he learned from his father.  He works every day of the week when his crops are in season.  He is requesting a loan to pay for land rental where he will plant corn.  Simón does not have enough land to use for his work, which is why he is turning to a loan to have the amount of money that the landowners are requesting so that he can use the land to grow corn and beans.  This loan will be a great help to Simón, as he will begin to prepare the land for planting and his reward will come in a few months with the harvest.  His goal is to work each season to support his family and his children so that they finish their education.

loans.use: to pay for land rental to plant corn and beans

loans.name: Lisbeth

texts.es: Lisbeth, es una dichosa mujer de 21 años. Junto a su esposo Hilder recibieron la llegada de su primogénita a la que aún no la pusieron un nombre. Pero prometen amarla y cuidarla en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Guacamayo (selva central peruana). Hace unos días fue bendecida por Díos, con el nacimiento de su hija. Su prioridad ahora es cuidar de su bebé a la que llamará Prisma, según menciona entre risas. Pensando en el futuro de ella, desea comenzar a sembrar en sus terrenos agrícolas. Por lo pronto seguirá trabajando arduamente como hace 2 años, en la venta de productos de belleza, perfumes, y cosméticos de toda variedad. Además de las ganancias que gana se suma a las de su esposo, quien trabaja en una hacienda de cítricos obteniendo ingresos semanales, con ellos espera concretar sus objetivos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “nuevo amanecer de Guacamayo”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde se siente feliz de poder pertenecer a una asociación, que velará por el progreso y desarrollo de sus integrantes. Lisbeth, siempre aprovecha las ofertas que traen las empresas de cosméticos para poder tener un stock. Por ello con el crédito esta pensando comprar una variedad de productos para está temporada de verano que se avecina.
texts.en:
Lisbeth is a happy 21 year old woman. She and her husband Hilder recently celebrated the arrival of their firstborn daughter, whom they have still to name. But they vow to love and care for her in their home in the community of Guacamayo (in the central Peruvian forest). 

A few days ago, God blessed Lisbeth with the birth of her daughter. Her priority now is to look after her baby. Laughing, she says she plans to call her Prisma. Thinking of her baby’s future, she wants to start planting her farm land. For the immediate future, she will continue working hard, as she has done for the past 2 years, in selling beauty products, perfumes, and all types of cosmetics. The money she earns is added to the money earned by her husband, who works on a citrus fruit farm and is paid weekly. With both streams of income they hope they can achieve their goals. Lisbeth belongs to the “New Dawn of Guacamayo” communal bank. This is her first loan with [field partner] MFP, and she is happy to be able to be part of an association that promotes the progress and development of its members. Lisbeth always tries out the offers that cosmetic companies bring her, so as to have a stock. With the loan she is planning to buy a variety of products for the approaching summer season.

loans.use: To stock up on beauty products

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José  Luis,28 años de edad, es originario del departamento de Nueva Segovia pero actualmente vive en Estelí , es casado tiene dos hijos de de 9 y1 año de edad respectivamente, de oficio comerciante dueño de pulpería, lleva 3 años en este negocio. 
El negocio lo inicio con capital propio, fue abasteciéndolo poco a poco, tenia 25 años cuando comenzó con su pulpería. Antes  trabajaba como obrero en una empresa. Su esposa le ayuda atender el negocio, debido a que ellos brindad sus servicios a las personas que trabajan en la fabrica de puros, se apoyan mutuamente para poder atender a los clientes. Tienen expectativas que su negocio prospere, tener un inventario mas surtido  de productos para consumo popular. 
El crédito lo solicita para comprar suplementos alimenticios de consumo masivo como carnes, granos básicos, pan, verduras. Con esto espera poder aumentar el numero de clientes, así mimo se incrementen sus ventas. Dentro de sus planes futuros esta poder convertir su negocio en un mini-super que tenga de todo tipo de  producto. Su meta próxima es poder ahorrar lo suficiente para poder pagar el tratamiento medico de su hija  mayor de 9años de edad y seguir invirtiéndole mas a su negocio.
texts.en:
José Luis is 28 years old.  He is originally from Nueva Segovia department but currently lives in Estelí.  He is married and has two children aged 9 and 1.  He owns a grocery store and has been in the business for 3 years.

José Luis set up his business with his own capital and gradually stocked his store.  He was 25 when he started the business, having previously been employed as a worker in a company.  José Luis' wife helps him to serve in the business.  They provide their services to people who work in the local cigar factory and support each other in serving the customers.  They have hopes that their business will prosper and gain a better inventory of products that people regularly buy.

José Luis is requesting this loan so that he can buy essential food products such as meat, basic grains, bread and vegetables.  He thereby hopes to increase his number of customers and also his sales.  One of his future plans is to convert his business into a mini-supermarket that sells all kinds of products.  His next goal is to save enough money so that he can pay for his [9-year-old] eldest daughter's medical treatment and continue to invest in his business.

loans.use: to buy essential food products such as meat, basic grains, bread and vegetables

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Doña María de 66 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, vive junto a su esposo, un hijo y una nieta, se dedica a la venta de tamales y verduras, este negocio fue fundado por iniciativa propia, aprendió de su madre y trabaja todos los días de 5:00am a 4:00pm desde hace 5 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña, aceite, hoja de banano, pollo y condimentos, estos productos son los que utiliza en la preparación de tamales, por lo que esta inversión le será de mucha ayuda para contar con todo lo necesario para realizar su venta y aumentar la producción.
El objetivo de doña María es mantenerse en el negocio, tener siempre ingresos para cubrir sus gastos y los de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 66 years old and lives in San Miguel with her husband, son, and granddaughter. She works selling tamales and vegetables, a trade which she learned from her mother. She started the business out of her own initiative and she has worked every day from 5am to 4pm for the past five years.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of corn, firewood, oil, banana leaves, chicken and condiments. These are the products that she uses when making tamales, which is why this investment will be a great help to her so that she will have everything necessary to make her sales and increase her production.

María’s goals are to maintain her business and to always have income to cover her and her family’s expenses.

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, oil, banana leaves, chicken and condimients

loans.name: Tamaraneh  5 Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Tamaraneh 5” group. They are small-scale businesspeople based in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan that these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profits, and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Hassan K.. Hassan is age 38; he was born in Kenema, where he is currently residing together with his wife and 3 children. His wife is a businesswoman and his children are attending school. For 15 years now, Hassan has been selling house-building materials. With this loan, he will buy house-building materials in large quantity to add to his business.

loans.use: to buy house-building materials lin large quantity to add to his business

loans.name: Jose Balmore

texts.es:
José de 39 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y dos sobrinos, él se dedica a una panadería, tiene 20 años de existir, prepara el pan todos los días de la semana y su familia le ayuda a atender los clientes y con el oficio que lleva el preparar el pan.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de Harina, azúcar, sal, levadura, estos son los materiales necesarios para la elaboración del pan, con ello José mejorara la producción y atenderá más eficiente a su clientela.
Las aspiraciones de José es mejorar el nivel de ingresos para su familia, tener mayor estabilidad en sus ventas para ofrecer una mejor condición a su hogar.
texts.en:
José is 39 years old and lives in El Tránsito in the Department of San Miguel with his wife and two nephews and nieces. He has a bakery which has been around for 20 years. He makes bread every day of the week and his family helps him to attend to the customers and to prepare the bread.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of flour, sugar, salt, and yeast, as these are the materials he needs to make the bread. With this, José will improve his production and attend to his customers more efficiently.

José’s aspirations are to improve his family’s level of income and to have his sales be more stable in order to provide his household with better conditions.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, salt and yeast

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase vehicle insurance

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es: Eduarda tiene  62 años vive en compañía de una de sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Se dedica a la crianza de animales y también a la agricultura desde su niñez, en la actualidad recibe la ayuda de sus hijos que ya son personas mayores que vienen en cada temporada de siembra y cosecha para apoyarla en este trabajo. De esta manera ha mejorado su situación que le permite seguir adelante ya que en muchas ocasiones este trabajo suele ser muy esforzado y requiere de alquilar maquinarias como tractor o bueyes para yunta que es básico para optimizar el tiempo, sus cosechas las lleva a vender al por mayor en el mercado central de la ciudad mas cercana a su localidad y en estos últimos años ha recuperado lo invertido, pero su mayor deseo es el de incursionar de manera mas formal el comercio de sus cultivos. Es la octavo crédito con MFP y le ha agradado durante este tiempo ser parte del banco comunal donde integraba por la solidaridad  de cada uno de sus miembros. En la actualidad ha optado por solicitar un crédito comunal por sus constantes viajes. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá comprar semillas mejoradas y también sacos de abono para esta temporada de siembra.
texts.en:
Eduarda is 62 years old and lives with one of her four children in her own home.  Her business is raising animals and farming.  She has been doing this since she was a child.  Eduarda receives help from her children.  They are grown up and come to support her in her work every planting and harvest season.  This has helped her to improve her situation and get ahead since this work is often very hard and requires her to hire machinery such as a tractor or a yoke of oxen which are essential in order to optimize her time.

Eduarda sells her harvested crops wholesale in the central market of the city nearest her town.  Over recent years she has recovered what she has invested but her greatest wish is to make more formal inroads into selling her crops.

This is Eduarda's eighth loan from MFP and she has always enjoyed being a member of her community bank which she joined because of the solidarity between all of its members.  She will use the loan she is requesting to buy improved seeds and also sacks of manure for the coming planting season.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and sacks of manure

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy material for making t-shirts and to buy an 'octopus' (a machine used for silk screen printing)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es: Maria Ofelia B.: ella trabaja todos los dias vendiendo ropa tipica es comerciante ambulante, tambien se dedica a la crianza de pollos solicita este crediro para la compra de blusas y cortes tipicos y consentrado para sus pollos tambien para la compra de hilo para sus bordados, su sueño es agrandar mas su negocio y mejorar sus ganancias para ayudar al sustento de su familia.
texts.en: Maria Ofelia B. works every day selling clothing as a street vendor.  She also dedicates herself to raising chickens.  The loan is for the purchase of blouses and other typical clothing, as well as for the care of her chickens.  She would like to also buy thread for her embroideries.  Her dreams are to expand her business and augment her earnings so she can help support her family.

loans.use: To purchase clothing, embroidery thread, and feed for chickens.

loans.name: Edith Audelia

texts.es:
Doña Edith, tiene 45 años D. edad, resiD. en El Transito departamento D. San Miguel, vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 10 y 7 años D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. ropa, este negocio inicio D. forma ambulante y con la ayuda D. una amiga, logro instalarse en un puesto fijo en el mercado municipal D. El Transito, su horario D. ventas en D. 7:00am a 5:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio comprando ropa D. moda y que es solicitada por los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara para fortalecer y crecer con su puesto D. venta, generándole más competitividad frente a los demás.
Doña Edith aspira para un futuro tener un negocio auto sostenible capaz D. atender la demanda y mantener un buen número D. clientes, que su familia cuente con mayores beneficios y que sus hijos tengan lo necesario para desarrollarse.
texts.en: Edith is 45 years old, she lives in El Transito, a department of San Miguel.  She lives with her husband and two children of 10 and 7 years of age.  She sells clothes, a business that got its start in ambulant form. With the help of a friend, she was able to obtain a fixed location at the municpal market in El Transito.  Her hours of business are from 7AM to 5PM.  She is soliciting a loan to invest in the business by purchasing fashionable clothing that is in demand with clients.  This loan will help her fortify and grow her shop, creating a competitive edge amongst the rest.  Edith aspires for a future having a self-sustainable business capable of meeting the demand and maintaining a good number of clients, that her family can count on benefits, and that her children have enough to grow.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to stock her business.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité San Cayetano de la zona de San Lorenzo está conformado por señoras muy unidas a pesar de las distintas dificultades que iban atravesando, pues todo eso les da fuerzas.
Podemos mencionar el caso de la señora Laura V. posee una despensa o pequeña tienda de comestibles, con los ingresos de tal negocio puede mantenerse ella misma y a su familia, y desea poder aumentar dichos ingresos económicos, por ello solicita el crédito para comprar más mercaderías comestibles y poder venderlos nuevamente.
texts.en:
The group San Cayetano of the San Lorenzo zone is comprised of very united women, despite the varying difficulties that they have been through.  However, all of these experiences have made them stronger.  

We can mention the case of Ms. Laura V., who has a dispensary or small general store that generates the necessary income to support her and her family.  She would like to increase her earnings, and is requesting the loan to buy more food/merchandise to sell.

loans.use: To buy empanada dough, meats, eggs, flour, ground crackers, salt, lemons, vegetables, cooking oil, condiments, cassava, breads to accompany fried foods, etc.

loans.name: Dinorah Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Dinorah, tiene 47 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 18 y 12 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de tostadas, su familia le ayuda a la preparación de dicho producto, este negocio lo inicio hace varios años ya que tenia la necesidad de ayudar a su esposo a cubrir los gastos del hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar materiales para realizar sus  ventas: plátanos verdes, yuca y bolsas.  Esta compra le ayudara a mantener lo necesario para producir y ofrecer a los clientes siempre una buena atención.
Su aspiración es que a través del negocio pueda mejorar la condición económica de su familia y hacer crecer a sus hijos con la educación para que se puedan desempeñar en un trabajo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dinorah is 47 years old.  She lives in the El Tránsito area of San Miguel with her husband and two children ages 18 and 12.  She sells tostadas (fried plantain), which her family helps her prepare.  She started this business a number of years ago when she needed to help her husband cover the household expenses.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase the ingredients she needs for her sales:  green plantains, yucca, and bags. This purchase will help her to have sufficient product to always provide her customers with good service. She hopes that with this business she can improve her family's financial conditions and raise her children with an education so they can find work.

loans.use: to purchase green plantains, yucca, and bags.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de materiales de construcción como arena y piedras para cimientos en las construcciones de las casas, su esposo es el que adquiere la materia prima en las orillas de los ríos mas cercanos para abastecerse de material. Le agrada desarrollar este trabajo porque le permite tener mejores ganancias a comparación de otros negocios, además de que considera  de que esta actividad es muy rentable porque siempre el rubro de la construcción es permanente en su demanda y lo importante en su negocio es  tener más capital disponible para adquirir más materia prima por lo que su deseo es contar  con un almacén más amplio. Es su crédito en MFP, ha tenido una experiencia positiva de créditos en su banco comunal donde valora bastante el desarrollo del habito del ahorro, en la actualidad solicita un crédito individual de la cual se compromete ser puntual en sus pagos. En esta ocasión el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más agregados.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 42 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children.  For 8 years, she has been selling building supplies such as sand and stone for making cement that is used in building houses  Her husband stocks the business with raw materials which he acquires from the banks of the nearest rivers.  Eduarda likes this work because it allows her to good profits compared to other businesses.  She also considers her business to be very profitable because the building trade has a permanent demand for supplies.  The important thing in her business is having capital available in order to acquire more raw materials.  Her wish is to have a bigger warehouse.

Luzmila is receiving this loan from MFP.  She has had positive experiences in taking loans as a member of her community bank.  She is particularly happy to have developed a savings habit.  Eduarda is currently requesting an individual loan and she pledges to be punctual in making her repayments.  On this occasion, she will invest the loan money that she is requesting in buying more aggregate materials for her business.

loans.use: to buy aggregate construction materials

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco  tiene 44 años y es soltero, desde muy joven empezó a trabajar con su tío en su taller de herrería, desde hace 3 años logró comprar algunas maquinarias básicas y trabajar por cuenta propia, gracias a la calidad de trabajo que ofrece  ya  tiene una buena cantidad de clientela formada.
El necesita de este crédito para comprar hierros y pintura en cantidad  y de esta manera poder  obtener mejores ganancias.
Francisco anhela comprar un terreno y construir un propio local.
texts.en:
Sr. Francisco is 44 years old and single. When he was a young man, he started working with his uncle in his blacksmith’s shop. Then, three years ago, he managed to buy some basic tools and start his own business. Because his work is of high quality, he now has his own regular clients.

Francisco needs a loan to buy more iron and paint so that he can increase his income. His greatest wish is to buy some land where he can build his own workshop.

loans.use: to buy more iron and paint

loans.name: Gladys Zoila

texts.es: Gladys Zoila R. M.  se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general desde hace mas de tres años eligió este tipo de negocio ya que en la zona por donde vive no hay tiendas con mercadería variada como la de su bodega,se inicio con poco capital en un reducido espacio de su vivienda y vio factible implementar su negocio ya que no solo vende abarrotes si no también verduras entre otros no tiene mucha competencia en su zona es conocida por sus vecinos con quienes tiene una muy buena relacion , ella es casada y su esposo trabaja de manera independiente apoyando en el ingreso familiar,tiene dos hijos uno de dos años y el otro en edad escolar de seis años; su sueño es llegar a tener una tienda mas grande y surtida donde sus clientes puedan encontrar todos los productos a precios economicos, esta solicitando el crédito para comprar mercaderia para su negocio y asi incrementar sus ventas mensuales
texts.en: Sra. Gladys Zoila R. M. sells groceries from a small store she has in her house. She chose this type of business three years ago because in the area where she lives there are no stores with varied merchandise such as she has. She began with a little capital in a small space in her home and saw that is would be feasible to begin her own business selling not only groceries but also vegetables. There is not a lot of competition in the area. She is well known by her neighbors with whom she has a very good relationship. She is married and her husband works independently helping with the household income. She has two children, one is two years old and the other is school age (six years old). Her dream is to have a bigger store and well-stocked store where her clients can find products at an economical price.

loans.use: Comprar mercaderia para su negocio

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila madre soltera, sus hijos ya son mayores e independientes anteriormente trabajaba lavando y planchando, ahora trabaja como domestica, sus hijos le ayudan y tiene cuartos de alquiler los cuales son ingreso extra para cubrir los gastos. Su vivienda es humilde y poco a poco ha ido realizando mejoras mediante el financiamiento. 
El préstamo que solicitad será para compra materiales: cemento, arena, hierro, perlines, bloques, laminas de zinc para construir el anexo que será la cocina de la vivienda.
texts.en: Petronila is a single mother.  Her chidren are already adults and live independently.  She used to work washing and ironing clothes.  She now works as a housekeeper and her children help her.  She has rooms to rent as well which provide extra income to cover expenses.  Her home is humble and little by little she has made improvements with loans.  The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase construction materials:  cement, sand, iron, roof beams, concrete blocks, and zinc plates to construct an addition to her home that will be a kitchen.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of her home.

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es: Juana casada su esposo trabajo como conductor de transporte pesado le ayudan con los gastos económicos de la casa. Sus hijos ya son mayores e independientes. Anteriormente trabaja en su casa pero ahora tiene su propio negocio de transporte se desempeña como gestora de carga siendo un gran avance para el desarrollo en la sociedad. Con este préstamo comprara materiales de construcción como: Cemento, bloques, arena, piedrines, estribus, alambre de amarre, kit de servicio, lava manos, puerta, reglones, camisa, ladrillo entre otros materiales de construcción que serán requerido para construir su baño así obtendrá comodidad y salud.
texts.en: Juana is married and her husband is a heavy transport driver and they help him with the household expenses.  Her children are grown and independent. She used to work at home but now she has her own transportation business, working as the load manager. It is a great advancement for the development in their society. With this loan she will purchase construction materials such as: cement, construction blocks, sand, gravel, stirrups, wiring, servicing kit, hand cleaners, a door, screeds, bricks and other construction materials which will be required to build a bathroom for their comfort and health.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angelica R.: Doña Angelica Tiene 33 años y se dedica a la venta de especies en el mercado de su localidad nececita refinanciar su credito para poder invertir en sus especies y asi mismo variar sus productos como comprar mas en pepitoria,ajonjolin,etc y de la misma manera aumentar sus ganacias para poder 
ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien para que en un futuro sean unos profecionales.
texts.en: 33-year old Doña Angelica sells spices in the local market. She needs a loan so she can buy more spices and other products such as different types of seeds (eg sesame) to offer to her customers. This will help to increase her income so that she can pay for her children’s education and help them get good jobs in the future.

loans.use: buy more spices and seeds

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma tiene 36 años, es casada vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Ella se dedica a las actividades agrícolas, trabajo que lo realiza en su tierra natal, que es un pueblo rural lleno de belleza y netamente agricultora, casi toda su vida estuvo ahí, ya que sus padres la criaron y le enseñaron a cultivar la tierra. Actualmente tiene una familia consolidada, por ello y con razón se dedica  a la agricultura, considera como una fuente de ingresos importante para su hogar y junto a su esposo y sus hijos trabajan en cada temporada para sembrar papa, maíz, trigo, cebada habas entre otros productos mas de su zona. En la temporada de cosecha, es la época más agitada y por lo general necesita de ayuda y es ahí donde contrata peones para que se dediquen a recoger los cultivos. En ambas temporadas siempre necesita de dinero  inmediato para comprar las semillas, arrendar una yunta y demás implementos necesarios, por lo que siempre acude a solicitar un crédito que siempre la han favorecido en el crecimiento económico. Es por esta razón que en adelante desea adquirir más terrenos de cultivo y ser una comerciante mayorista de  los productos que cosecha, en esta ocasión el crédito le servirá para la compra de sacos de abono que es indispensable para la preparación de sus terrenos. Es  el octavo crédito que solicita con MFP tiene amplia experiencia en créditos  dentro de su banco comunal de la que tiene gratos recuerdos pero en esta oportunidad ha decidió solicitar un crédito individual. Con este dinero comprará varios sacos de abono cuyo presupuesto cubre una parte y la otra que falta  viene de su propio capital que unirá para abastecer a toda la extensión de su terreno.
texts.en:
Vilma is 36 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and their two children in her own house.  She devotes herself to farming.  She does this work in her native land; a beautiful, rural farming village.  She has been there almost all of her life because her parents raised her there.  They taught her how to cultivate the land.

She now has a strong family, which is why she farms.  It is an important source of income for her household.  She works with her husband and her children in each season in order to grow potatoes, corn, wheat, barley, beans, and other products in her zone.  Harvest time is the busiest, and they generally need more help.  That is when they hire field workers to harvest the crops.  In both seasons she always needs cash on hand to buy seeds, to rent a yoke of oxen, and for the other needed tools.  

That is why she always requests a loan.  The loans have always helped with her financial growth.  That is the reason that she later wishes to acquire more farm land and to be a wholesaler of her harvested products.

This time she will use the loan to buy sacks of fertilizer, which is indispensable in preparing the land.  This is the eighth loan that she has requested from MFP.  She has extensive experience with loans with her communal bank, and she remembers them gratefully.  However, on this occasion she has decided to request an individual loan.  She will use the money to buy sacks of fertilizer, which will cover part of the cost.  She will use her own money for what the loan does not cover.  The loan and her own money will supply enough for all of her land.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Emprendedoras nació hace más de 3 años mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar.
Este comité es de San Lorenzo, en estos más de cinco años de intenso trabajo han crecido tanto social como económicamente, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
La sra. Cristina por ejemplo, vende frutas en un puesto que posee como propio, pero debido al cambio de estación de clima (verano a otoño) desea poder ampliar la gama de frutas que ofrece a sus clientes, pero para ello necesita de un crédito que la ayude a poder adquirir gran cantidad de frutas, de modo que pueda obtener mayores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
The committee of Mujeres Emprendedoras (Entrepreneurial Women) formed more than three years ago through the leadership and support of another committee that was working in the area.
This committee is from San Lorenzo and in over the past more than five years of intense work they have grown socially as well as economically and are recognized in that area as very hard-working women.
Cristina, for example, sells fruits in a stand that she owns, but due to the seasonal change in the climate (summer to fall) she would like to be able to expand the range of fruits that she offers to her customers, but she needs a loan to help her to be able to acquire a large quantity of fruits so that she can improve her income.

loans.use: to buy citrus fruits, pomelos, oranges, bananas, passion fruit, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria R.: Tiene 34 años desde muy pequeña vindia con su mama ahora tiene un puesto en el mercado local de su localidad,se dedica a la venta de verduras y especies para comida, nececita su refinanciamiento para invertir mas en verduras ya que ella tiene a una persona que le ayuda a vender en otro pueblo y nececita que sus verduras sean variables para complaser la demanda de sus clientes y clientes nuevos, su deceo es poder tener un local mas en el mercado, y asi tener mas ganancias.
texts.en: Maria R. is 34-years-old and since she was very little she has sold with her mother.  Now she has a stand in the local market for her town and works selling vegetables and seasonings for food.  She needs a loan to invest more in vegetables as she has a person who helps her in another town and she needs more varieties of vegetables to meet the demand from her customers and also new customers.  Her hope is to be able to have another stand in the market and thus have more profits.

loans.use: to buy wholesale vegetables.

loans.name: Gorgorlou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité GORGORLOU est créé le 16 février 2000. Il est composé de 15 femmes qui sont de quartier différents. Mais se réunissent mensuellement pour les activités du Banc Villageois. Elles sont pratiquement toutes des femmes qui font du petits commerce. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de Keur Khaly

Madame ISSEU S. (debout à droite de la photo et mise en médaillon en bas) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 54 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants. Elle a aussi la charge des 05 autres enfants de sa sœur décédée.

Elle est détentrice d'une cantine au marché centre de la ville. Elle y vend des tissus et des vêtements. Comme activité secondaire elle fait de l'embouche bovine et ovine et de l'élevage de volailles. Elle a une expérience de plus de trente ans dans le domaine du commerce.

Son actuelle prêt lui permettra de renforcer sa capacité de production en matière de commerce et de mieux développer son élevage.

Son objectif à long terme est de construire une maison pour sa famille. Ses revenus financiers lui permettent de prendre entièrement en charge les besoins de ses enfants. En terme de réalisation elle a acheté un taxi pour son fils afin que ce dernier puisse se prendre en charge.
texts.en:
The Gorgorlou solidarity group was created on February 16, 2000. It is composed of 15 women who live in different neighborhoods. But they meet each other monthly for the activities related to Banc Villageois. Almost all of them are vendors. Their group belongs to the Banc Villageouis of Keur Khaly.
Mrs. Isse S. (to the right in the photo) is the group’s leader. She is 54 years old. She is married and the mother of five. In addition, she also  takes care of five children of her deceased sister. 

She keeps a cafeteria at the main market of their town. She sells fabrics and clothing there. As a secondary activity, she raises cattle, sheep and chickens. She has over 30 years of experience as a vendor.

Her loan will allow her to expand her production volume and to better develop her livestock business. Her long-term objective is to build a house for her family. Her revenues allow her to provide for her children fully. As a practical example, she has purchased a taxi for her son in order for him to be able to support himself.

loans.use: to increase her production volume

loans.name: Mujeres Virtuosas Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Virtuosas es de la zona de Conavi Mboi de San Lorenzo. Ya son reconocidas en la zona por su trabajo a favor del bienestar de la comunidad.
Estas señoras son trabajadoras en sus pequeños negocios. Por ejemplo la presidenta, Sara A., tiene una casa de alquileres y decoraciones, y ahora desea completar su equipo de artículos para fiestas infantiles principalmente y comprarse un Globo Loco, ya que le está yendo demasiado bien.
texts.en: El The committee Mujeres Virtuosas (Virtuous Women) is in the Conavi Mboi zone of San Lorenzo.  They are already recognized in the area for their work for the well-being of the community.  These women are hard-workers in their small businesses.  For example, the president, Sara A., has a store for party rentals and decorations and would like to complete her set of equipment for children’s parties and buy a bouncy castle as now she is making many sales.

loans.use: to buy a "Globo Loco" (bouncy castle) and other games for children's birthday parties and decorations.

loans.name: Augusta

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Augusta. She is married and has 4 children aged 23, 19, 18 and 8. She has 1 additional dependent who lives with her because she is her relative. 

In 2006, Augusta established her pharmacy business. She began her business after completing her training as a professional nurse. Augusta’s pharmacy is located in the outer parts of the city where medical facilities are very poor. This pharmacy serves a lot of villagers who live around Bo city. Working 7 days a week and 9 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. Augusta has a good loan repayment history. She requires a loan in order to buy additional medical drugs. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Augusta plans to establish her business in the heart of the city and help her husband educate their children to the university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy additional medical drugs to resell

loans.name: Ana Alicia

texts.es: Ana Alicia R.: se dedica a la venta de frutas desde hace un años y tiene un local en el mercado local de su cominidad ella nos cuenta que nececita su refinanciamiento para invertir en compra de  mas frutas especial mente en la compra de mangos,por el tiempo ya que ella esta fruta lo hace de diferentes maneras como mango con miel,etc su deceo ahora es poder vender mas variedad de frutas, y sacar adelante a su hija como tambien ella misma.
texts.en: Ana Alicia R. has been selling fruits for a few years.  She has a stand at the local market in her community.  Ana says that she needs a loan to invest in the purchase of more fruits, especially mangoes.  At the moment, she is preparing the fruit in different ways, such as serving mango with honey.  Now she wants to sell a greater variety of fruits so that she and her daughter can move forward.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of fruits to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional clothing for her business to resell

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es:
La Sra. Otilia  tiene  40  años y está casada con Hugo M., quien no participa del crédito por encontrarse D. viaje.
Ellos viven en la Ciudad D. San Lorenzo a unos 40 Km D. su lugar D. trabajo, ellos tienen un Puesto D. venta en el Mercado Municipal D. San Lorenzo a pocas cuadras D. la oficina D. Fundación Paraguaya y trabajan allí todos los días, inclusive los domingos.
Viajan a la madrugada para estar en su puesto antes D. las 6 D. la mañana, hora en que llegan los pescados D. varios puertos del país.
Con este crédito piensan comprar una congeladora y mayor cantidad D. pescados.
texts.en:
Sra. Otilia is 40 years old and married to Hugo M., who is not participating in this loan because he travels on the road. They live in the city of San Lorenzo, which is approximately 40 km from the place where they work. Otilia and her husband have a vending stall at the San Lorenzo Muncipal Market, which is a few blocks away from the Fundación Paraguaya office. They work at the market every day, including Sundays.

Otilia and her husband must leave at dawn in order to get to their vending post before 6am, the hour when most of the fish arrives from various ports. With this loan, she wants to buy a freezer and a large quantity of fish.

loans.use: To purchase a freezer and large quantity of fish.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: This is 43 year-old Hawa. She is a Widow and has 5 children aged 27, 24, 20, 11 and 4. She has 1 additional dependent who lives with her because the child is her niece. In 1981, Hawa established her business selling beans, Bennie and groundnuts. She began her business because she thinks the native goods have more profit. Working 7 days a week and 9 hours a day, she earns about Le 900,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Hawa has a good loan repayment history. She requires a loan in order to buy beans, Bennie and groundnuts for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 500,000. In the future, Hawa plans to get an outlet for sales and to educate her children. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans, Bennie and groundnuts for her business to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more ready made clothing for his business

loans.name: Fuente Viva Group

texts.es:
Grupo Solidario Fuente Viva: Angela P., ella tiene 2 hijos a su cargo se dedica a la venta de manias,y roscas de feria desde hace 10 años se dedica a esa actividad,ella nececita su credito para la compra de insumos para la elavoracion de roscas de feria.
Maria Delfina: tiene una hija pequeña ella y su esposo se dedican a la venta de panitos de feria,y tamvien ventas de churros, nececita su credito para la compra de insumos para la elavoracion de roscas de feria y churros.
Andres C..el se dedica a la venta y elavoracion de panitos de feria roscas de feria tec, el  
nececita su credito para la compra de insumos para la elavoracion de roscas de feria y churros.
texts.en:
Source of Life Solidarity Group

Angela P. has two dependent children. She has been selling peanuts snacks and cookies for ten years. Angela needs this loan to buy supplies for making cookies.

Maria Delfina has a young daughter. She and her husband sell baked goods as well as donuts. Maria needs a loan to buy supplies for making cookies and donuts.

Andres C. prepares and sells bread and cookies. He needs a loan to buy supplies for making cookies and donuts.

loans.use: To purchase supplies for making baked goods.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa is married with an 11-year-old daughter, Alina. Larisa is a clothing sales entrepreneur from Novomoskovsk in the Dnepropetrovsk region. She sells men's outerwear, such as coats and jeans, in the central market of her hometown. Her hard work and natural openness have been instrumental in her business expansion. Larisa has been in the market for 7 years. 

Larisa is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnas and hopes to use it to purchase additional merchandise and diversify the assortment of inventory she offers for sale. Larisa's business is a considerable contribution to the family's budget. She and her husband work hard to make some savings to pay for their daughter's studies in college.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise such as coats and jeans for resale

loans.name: La Milagrosa Group

texts.es:
El comité La Milagrosa es de la zona de Calle'i de la ciudad de San Lorenzo.
Es el tercer crédito de las integrantes de este comité, se propusieron pagar los días lunes de modo que no las afecte económicamente, ya que de lunes a viernes trabajan mucho y constantemente.
La sra. Dominga M. se dedica a la venta ambulante y por catálogo de ropas o prendas interiores, especialmente de la marca "Kalua", muy demandada por las mujeres jóvenes, ella desea poder aumentar su cantidad de productos y prendas ofrecidas, por ello solicita el crédito, así podrá aumentar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The committee “La Milagrosa” (The Miraculous) is located in the District of Calle'I in the city of San Lorenzo. As a committee, the members are participating in their third loan cycle. They propose to submit their payments on Mondays so that they won’t be affected financially. The members work very hard Monday through Friday on a consistent basis.

Sra. Dominga M. works as a traveling merchant, selling clothes and undergarments from catalogs, particularly the “Kalua” brand. This line of clothing is in great demand among young women. Dominga wants to increase the quantity of products and outfits that she offers. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase materials for replacing the roof of his metal shop.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
Don José, se dedica a realizar viajes y vender verduras, tiene 72 años de edad, vive con su esposa, tienen su propia casa y además es pensionado; Él posee un vehículo en el cual  realiza viajes familiares o colectivos, también vende verduras de forma ambulante.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la reparación del vehículo ya que necesita hacerle algunos ajustes, pero no dispone del total de dinero para pagar el mecánico y comprar los repuestos. 
Este préstamo le ayudara a solventar esta situación y a mantener el vehículo en óptimas condiciones ofreciéndole a los clientes un viaje más seguro y cómodo; Él busca mejorar cada día su trabajo y sus ingresos, para garantizar a su familia una vida mas confortable.
texts.en:
Don José travels and sells vegetables. He is 72 years old and lives with his wife in their own home. José is also a pensioner. He has a vehicle that he uses for families or groups that want to travel. In addition, he sells vegetables as a traveling merchant.

Don José is requesting a loan to repair his vehicle since it is in need of some adjustments. However, he does have all the money necessary to pay a mechanic and buy spare parts. This loan will help resolve this situation and keep his vehicle in optimal condition so that his customers can travel safely and comfortably. He looks to improve each day in his work and increase his income so that his family can have a more comfortable life.

loans.use: To pay for vehicle repairs.

loans.name: Laura Cecilia

texts.es: La señora Laura es cliente nueva de la institución ella vive con su esposo en Villa Salome tienen dos pequeños hijos de 4 y 7 años de edad la Sra. Laura brida el servicio de  juegos en red e internet los cuales atiende desde el medio día hasta las diez de la noche antes trabajaba todo el día con Internet, su esposo don Milton trabaja como profesor de computación de informática en el colegio de la zona el crédito que esta solicitando es para ampliar su negocio y la compra de una línea telefónica  ya que cuenta con una y su deseó de ella es colocar también sus cabinas telefónicas y así poder ayudar mas en los ingresos de la familia, es una joven muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Laura is a new client of Emprender. She lives with her husband in Villa Salome and has two children, ages 4 and 7. Sra. Laura provides computer games and Internet services at her business which is open from noon until 10pm. She used to work all day with the Internet. Her husband, Don Milton, is a computer science teacher at a local school.

The loan she is requesting will be used to expand her business and acquire another telephone line. She already has one line, but she wants to install another one for her phone booths to help generate more income for her family. Laura is a hardworking young woman who is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: To install another phone line for her call center.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Anamile

texts.es: Anamile tiene 23 años, es soltera y vive el lado de sus padres y hermanos en la casa que es de la propiedad de sus padres. Desde hace varios años que tiene su propia fabrica de dulces de chocolates, instalado en su misma casa. Sus padres la apoyan en este negocio, sobre todo cuando es el tiempo de preparación, su trabajo es arduo y de todos los días ya que reparte a las diferentes tiendas de golosinas al por mayor. En su casa se ha convertido en una local de progreso y fuente principal de ingresos, sus deseos de superación la motivan a realizar este negocio, además que le sirve de sustento para cubrir los gastos de la universidad, ya que aún estudia. Se siente muy contenta de ver las ganancias de su creciente negocio que la motivan a seguir adelante, su principal compra es para el abastecimiento de insumos que le servirán para preparar sus golosinas. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta  muy contenta de acceder a una oportunidad de crédito que es muy ventajoso para el desarrollo de su negocio,  promete ser puntual en sus pagos y utilizar enteramente el dinero para mejorar su negocio. Con el crédito, lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor como cobertura de chocolates y envases al por mayor.
texts.en:
Anamile is 23 years old, single, and lives with her parents in their home along with her siblings. For several years, she has made chocolates at home. Her parents help with this business, especially during the time required for preparation. The work is hard and Anamile goes out every day to distribute in bulk to different candy shops. Her home business has become a place for making progress and the main source of income. The desire to succeed motivated her to establish this business and it helps her to cover her university expenses since she is still pursuing her education. Anamile is very happy to see the profits from her growing business which motivates her to continue forward. Her main expenses are the supplies used in preparing her sweets.

This is her first loan with MFP. Anamile is very happy to access an opportunity for a loan which she sees as advantageous for developing her business. She promises to be prompt with her payments and fully utilize the money to improve her business. The loan will be invested in wholesale supplies, such as melting chocolate and containers.

loans.use: To purchase melting chocolate and packing containers in bulk.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: La señora ROXANA es una socia nueva de la agencia, se encuentra en su primer ciclo, La señora es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora, casada con tres hijos, dos hijos mayores y una hija menor de quince años, su esposo es chofer con vehículo propio, La cliente tiene su domicilio propio y tiene como actividades económica  como líder de ventas de productos cosméticos y por otra parte la venta de cosméticos, el destino del crédito lo invertirá en lo que es la mejora de su vivienda y necesitara dinero para la compra de material de construcción, su deseo de la Sra. ROXANA es la de ver su casita bien refaccionada y terminada y de esta manera poder brindar mayor comodidad a su familia, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Roxana is a new member of Emprender who is participating in her first loan cycle. She is a hardworking and enterprising individual. Roxana is married and has three children, two of whom are grown while the youngest daughter is 15 years old. Her husband works as a driver and has his own vehicle. Roxana lives in her own home and earns her living by working as both a cosmetics sales manager and a sales representative.

Her loan will be invested in improvements to her home. She needs the money to buy construction materials. Sra. Roxana wishes to see her house repaired and completed so that her family will be more comfortable. She is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: To buy construction materials for home repairs and improvements.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Doña Sabina D. 59 años D. edad, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera departamento D. Morazán, vive con su esposo don Juan, sus hijos ya no viven con ellos. 
El negocio D. ella es la venta D. pupusas y comida,  sus platillos lo prepara para los empleados D. una cooperativa D. agua potable, por las tardes venD. las pupusas  a los vecinos del lugar; ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. materiales que son necesarios en la cocina y con los que ella prepara los alimentos, a la vez utilizara una parte para construir un cuarto en su vivienda.
Los objetivos D. doña Sabina son trabajar mientras goce D. buena salud, mejorar la vivienda para estar más cómodos y seguros con su esposo.
texts.en:
Sabina, 59 years old, lives in the San Francisco Gotera department of Morazan. She lives with her husband Juan; their children don't live with them any more.

Her business is selling tortillas and meals. She prepares her dishes for the workers at a water treatment facility. In the afternoons she sells the tortillas to her neighbors. She is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients necessary in the kitchen with which she will prepare her meals. She will also use part of the loan to add a room to her home.

Sabina's goals are to work while she enjoys good health, and to improve her house so she and her husband can be more comfortable and safe.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for preparing meals

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité Nueva Esperanza nació hace más de 5 años mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar.
Este comité es de San Lorenzo, en estos más de cinco años de intenso trabajo han crecido tanto social como económicamente, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras. Han pasado por una prueba muy difícil en el ciclo anterior ya que varias de las compañeras incumplieron en los compromisos de pago semanal, cancelaron el crédito y asumieron el compromiso de levantar nuevamente con éxito el comité al cual pertenecen.
La señora Silvia O. fue una de las más persistentes, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y agradece por el préstamo porque tiene muchas ganas de superarse constantemente y cree que sin este crédito no podría lograrlo, ella vive gracias a su puesto de frutas y sólo espera que siga prosperando, aunque eso cueste mucho sacrificio.
texts.en:
The committee “Nueva Esperanza” (New Hope) was started more than five years ago as a result of the efforts and support of another committee that was working in the same area.

This committee is located in San Lorenzo. After more than five years of hard work, the group has grown socially as well as financially. The members have been recognized locally for being hardworking women. They endured a very difficult situation in their previous loan cycle in which several members defaulted on their weekly loan payment. As a result, their loans were cancelled and they pledged to rise up again to become a successful part of the committee to which they belong.

Sra. Silvia O. is one of the most persistent members. She sells fruit and is grateful for her loan because she has great eagerness to succeed. Without this loan, she believes she would not able to accomplish her goals. She survives as a result of her fruit stand and only hopes to continue prospering, even though it requires a great amount of sacrifice.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of fruits to sell.

loans.name: Wilber Armando

texts.es:
Wilber, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, tiene 33 años de edad y vive con su esposa María Esperanza y sus tres hijos: Wilber de 13 años, Dilver de 11 Y Bryan Isaac de 9 años de edad; Él se dedica a un taller de estructuras metálicas  y una tienda de productos de uso domestico, estos negocios los administra en su casa de habitación, en el taller realiza los trabajos solicitados para luego transportarlos donde los clientes.
Actualmente necesita un  préstamo para comprar materiales como Hierro, también para la tienda comprara productos como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, maíz, esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar su trabajo en los dos negocios.
Para Wilber el objetivo primordial y por el que cada día se esfuerza trabajando es construir su propia casa donde pueda vivir su familia en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Wilber lives in San Francisco Gotera, department of Morazan. He is 33 years old and lives with his wife Maria Esperanza and their three children: Wilber, 13, Dilver, 11, and Bryan Isaac, 9. He makes metal structures and has a grocery store. He runs these businesses out of his home; for the metal work, he completes the orders in his home and then delivers them to customers.

He now needs a loan to purchase material such as iron, and for his store he will buy items such as beans, rice, sugar, and corn. This investment will help him improve both his businesses.

Wilber's main goal, and the reason he works so hard every day, is to build his own home where he can live with his family in better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as iron and domestic items such as beans, rice, and sugar

loans.name: Rosa Bertha

texts.es: La señora Rosa se dedica a  la actividad de la elaboración y venta de comida en la localidad del paso, se dedica esta actividad desde hace veinte años, cuenta con buena clientela ya que es muy conocida en la localidad por sus riquísimos platos, vive en domicilio en anticrético, su esposo es jubilado recibe una renta mensual y tiene una niña a quien esta criando, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. Rosa comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus riquísimos platillos la señora tiene un buen historial crediticio en la institución, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, uno de sus deseos es el poder comprarse su casita y así poder tener su propia pensión, la Sra. Esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa has been preparing and selling food in the town of El Paso for twenty years. She has a good customer base and is well-known in the community for her delicious food. Rosa lives in a rental property. Her husband is retired and receives a monthly pension, while her daughter is already grown.

Sra. Rosa will use the money from her loan to buy supplies for preparing her flavorful dishes. She has a good credit history with Emprender. Rosa is very responsible and a hard worker. One of her wishes is to buy a small house so that she can open her own diner. She is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: To purchase supplies for food preparation.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is divorced and has one son. She owns a small business that sells clothing at the central market in Novomoskovsk and has been in this business for fifteen years. She has always offered high quality products and excellent client service. She has many repeat clients that make her business a success. Irina has an active life that encourages her business neighbors and friends. 

Irina has used micro-loans before and found them very helpful. This time, she would like to borrow 20,000 Grivnas to increase her inventory. She hopes to increase her sales and receive additional income to take better care of her family as well as help her son pay for college.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of coats for resale

loans.name: Astria

texts.es: Astria tiene 44 años, nacida en el distrito de San Francisco; esta casada con Severino de 44 años de edad y tienen 09 hijos y cuentan con su propia casa ubicado en la avenida Tupac Amaru del distrito de Kimbiri. Astria y su esposo son el sostén de su familia. Desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, Astria es campesina y cuenta con 05 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de café y plantas de piña, frutos de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Viene trabajando 22 años en sus propias tierras, y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de la mano de los jornaleros  para  así avanzar con mayor  rapidez con las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos y frutos de piña. Su dificultad es no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas; es por ello que acude a los créditos que facilita la Institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de piña ya que cuenta con 02 hectareas de terreno no cultivado. Este es su séptimo crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy querida por el resto de sus compañeros. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles solicitados, contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en la cosecha.
texts.en:
Astria is 44 years old and was born in the District of San Francisco.  She is married to Severino, age 44, and they have nine children.  They have their own home located along Tupac Amaru Avenue in the District of Kimbiri.  Astria and her husband are the breadwinners of their family.  When Astria was a young girl, her parents taught her how to work on a farm.  She is now a farmer and has five hectares of land on which she plants coffee and pineapples, tropical fruits grown in the Apurimac River Valley.  Astria has worked on her land for 22 years, and during the harvest season she has the help of her children and the labor of workers who can pick the fruit with great speed.  She considers the most difficult part of her job to be transporting her products from the farm to the distribution centers in the city of San Francisco, the place that offers the best prices for grain and pineapples.  Her difficulty is when she lacks sufficient income to pay her workers in advance since they provide assistance during the harvest.  For this reason, she has taken out loans with institutions such as MFP.  Now her highest priority is to plant more pineapples since she has two hectares of land that have not been cultivated.  

This is her seventh loan with MFP.  Astria feels the support has helped her greatly in making progress in her work.  In her Communal Bank, she is well-respected by the other members.  The loan of 2000 PEN that she is requesting will be used to hire workers to help with the harvest.

loans.use: To hire workers to help with the harvest.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga D. 35 años D. edad, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera, departamento D. Morazán, vive con sus tres hijas Yesica D. 18 años, Ingrid D. 15 y Claudia D. 6 años D. edad; Dominga se dedica a la venta D. comida almuerzos y desayunos, trabaja en su puesto en el mercado municipal, este negocio es la fuente D. ingreso con la que cuenta para cubrir todas las necesidades del hogar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. materiales para cocina, los cuales son ingredientes que a diario necesita para preparar sus menús,  comprara pollo, carnes, verduras, condimentos, aceite y bebidas, dicha inversión será un gran apoyo para fortalecer su producción y mejorar la atención a los clientes.
Las aspiraciones D. Dominga con respecto al negocio son, que este sea cada vez más capaz y rentable, que sus hijas puedan prepararse académicamente para que tengan mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Dominga, 35 years old, lives in San Francisco Gotera, in the department of Morazon. She lives with her three daughters, Yesica, 18, Ingrid, 15, and Claudia, 6. Dominga sells lunches and breakfasts; she works out of a stall in the city market. The business is the source of income that she counts on to cover all the household needs.

She is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients for cooking, which are items that she needs every day to prepare her menus. She will purchase chicken, meats, vegetables, condiments, oil, and beverages, which will be of great help in increasing her production and improving her customer service.

Dominga's goals with respect to the business are that each day it will be more efficient and profitable so that her daughters can succeed academically and have better opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, meats, vegetables, condiments, oil, and beverages

loans.name: Marianita De Jesús

texts.es:
Marianita De Jesús T. A. tiene 57 años, Es Soltera vive con la hija y dos nietos en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  JUNTOS PROGRESAMOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Matilde Esther  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra maíz, arroz, maracayá en pocas cantidades y a la cría de animales como chanchos y gallinas.

Marianita se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y a la cría de chanchos y gallinas. Compra sus productos en  Mata de Cacao cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y  compra de  animales además para insumos de alimentación e insumos para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar la educaron a los nietos.

Le gusta mucho salir con la hija y los nietos al parque a jugar.
texts.en:
Marianita De Jesús T. A. is 57 years old.  She is single and lives with a daughter and 2 grandchildren in the Chillanes canton of Bolivar province.  She has 3 children.

The members of the communal bank "Juntos Progresamos" live in the rural Matilde Esther community in the canton of Chillanes.  This communal bank has 12 members who work in short cycle agriculture, cultivating corn, rice, and maracayá (a fruit) in small quantities.  They also raise animals such as pigs and chickens.

Marianita cultivates corn and raises pigs and chickens.  She buys her products in Mata de Cacao at the end of the month, and she sells her products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

She is requesting a loan to cultivate corn and to buy animals.  She will also buy supplies for her livestock and for her farming activities.  The support of this loan would help her to stock up on these items that she needs for her business.  She has encountered challenges in her business such as pests and changes in the weather that affect her crops.  Her dream is to be able to provide her grandchildren with an education.

She enjoys going out with her daughter when she takes her children to the park to play.

loans.use: to buy animals and also supplies for her livestock and farming activities.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El Sr. Wilfredo se dedica al transporte de pasajeros de la localidad de Vinto a la ciudad de Cochabamba desde hace tres años, trabaja con vehículo de su propiedad trabaja desde muy tempranas horas de la madrugada y hasta altas horas de la noche, solicita el crédito para la construcción de su vivienda ya que esta se encuentra en obra bruta y necesita el monto para la compra de cerámica para el piso el anterior crédito lo cancelo puntualmente y ahora solicito otro crédito su  esposa ya tiene su puesto de venta en la caseta que construyeron con prestamos anteriores, viven en domicilio de su propiedad en la localidad de Vinto, es una persona trabajadora con ganas de superación, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Wilfredo has transported passengers from the Vinto taxi stand in the city of Cochabamba for the last 3 years.  He uses a vehicle he owns, working from very early in the morning until late at night.  

Wilfredo requests a loan to construct a new home, since his present house is a crude structure.  He needs the loan to purchase tile for the floor.  His last loan was repaid punctually and now he is soliciting another.  

Wilfredo's wife operates a market stall in the small structure they built with previous loans.  Their domicile is on their property in the Vinto locale.  Wilfredo is a hard-working person with the desire to get ahead.  He is very grateful to the institution for offering to help.

loans.use: TO LAY A TILE FLOOR IN THE HOUSE THEY ARE CONSTRUCTING

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: Feliciano tiene 49 años, nacido en el distrito de San Francisco; esta casado con Domitila de 48 años y tienen 06 hijos y cuentan con su propia casa, ubicada en la comunidad de Vista Alegre Alta; anexo del distrito de Kimbiri. Feliciano, es el sostén de su familia, desde muy niño sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, es campesino y cuenta con 05 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de café y piña, frutos de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Viene trabajando 25 años en sus propias tierras, en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de la mano de los jornaleros  para  así avanzar con mayor  rapidez con las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos y frutos de piña. Su dificultad es; no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo durante la cosecha; es por ello que acude a los créditos que facilita la Institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de piña ya que cuenta con 01 hectarea de terreno no cultivado. Este es su séptimo crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy querido por el resto de sus compañeros, ya que es muy solidario con ellos. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles solicitados, contratará jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en la cosecha de café.
texts.en: Feliciano is 49 years old and was born in the San Francisco district.  He is married to Domitilia, who is 48, and he has 6 children.  The family has their own home which is located in the community of Vista Alegre Alta, an annex of the Kimbiri district. Feliciano is the one who supports his family.
